TouchPointId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze touch point id, if the touch point is identifiable, format TouchPoint_[sourceSystem]_[TouchPointNumber] e.g TouchPoint_D365_012

TouchPointKey.description: The native touch point number from source, if the touch point is identifiable e.g 012

TouchPointClass.description: The class of the touch-point device used for the transaction e.g ConsumerDigital

TouchPointDeviceType.description: The class of the touch-point device used for the transaction e.g Tablet

TouchPointSystem.description: The touch-point system the transaction originated from, if it has a name e.g eBasket, EndlessAisle

Device.description: The devive details of the device used in the context of this touch point

IPAddress.description: The IP address of the touch-point device

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
